title: [1.7.2~1.6.4]Flan's Mod 的扩充包合集
author: cyc499357458
txt_content:
本帖最后由 sb023612 于 2014-6-13 22:45 编辑 

大家好，我是CYC这次为大家来搬运Flan's Mod 的扩充包
一，
LPxPlayer'sCommunity-Weapon-Pack支持版本：4.1.x
作者的原文：
The Minecraft-SMP Community Weapon Pack ! Made by the Community , for the Community ( the guns are named after the Minecraft-SMP forum members )Contains over 60 weapons from all different countries and eras !Lovely 32x32 textures !Check it out now !图片：
下载地址：http://www.mediafire.com/download/mc2p2b7s8z7o2fb/LPxPlayer%27sCommunity-Weapon-Pack+V.1.7.zip二， Minecraft-SMP Parts Package 1.6.4b原文：
Minecraft-SMP Parts Package 1.6.4b used for all Packages of Minecraft-SMP图片：



我发的这些包要有这给包支持！，这个包是零件包！
支持版本：4.1.x
下载地址：
http://flansmod.com/content-pack-download/?id=10
三，
 Elite Guns! (5.0) Modern Guns! - 1.7.2原文：
Welcome to my Pack!

This pack will not get updated anymore!If you want to help me for free press on this linkhttp://twixzo.de/profil.php?id=70261


Here is a poll where you can vote for a new weapon!Link : http://adf.ly/jhrsj
Without adfly : http://strawpoll.me/1493616
Changelog:<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<v5.0 (22.04.2014)Added M1911 (+ Ammo, + Scope)New Mildot Scope (DMR)New M16 Reddot sightUpdated to 1.7.2v4.0 (13.04.2014)Added M14 DMR (+ Ammo , + Scope)Retexted Descripton of AmmoTHANKS for over 600 Downloads and 1 Dollar at Adf.lyv3.1 (3.04.2014)Fixed a Buggv3.0 (2.04.2014)Thanks for over 250 Downloads!Added new PSO ScopeRetextured M16 a bitv2.5 (28.03.2014)Added M16A4Time I needed for the gun : 45 Minutesv2.0 (28.03.2014)Thanks for 104 Downloads!Retextured SVDRetextured SVD/Pso ScopeRetextured SVD MagNew Weapon Box texture (Sphax)v1.3 (26.03.2014)34 Downloads :PRetextured AUGRetextured AUG ScopeRetextured AUG Magv1.0 (19.03.2014)+ AUG A3 added+ SVD Dragunov added+ AUG Magazin added+ SVD Magazin added+ Weapon Box added!

95% Self maked!I've used:Magix 2014Gimp 2Sound ConveraterGoogle Pictures :P
---- If you make a Server pls contact me !mcwarowner@gmail.com图：
支持版本：4.1x 或 4.2.x下载：http://adf.ly/kd1Ls四，DC's Guns for Flans Mod 4.1.1 版本：4.1.1


原文：
A large gun pack with scopes, iron sights, and AP ammo. Don't use bayonets. They don't work. Originally made for a private server. Kind of realistic. HD (32x32). For recipes, use NEI or TMI, or look in the content pack files for boxes and parts. Updated with minor texture changes and bug fixes.
下载：
https://www.dropbox.com/s/c28416js4cshn6v/DCsGunsV2.4ForFlansMod4.1.zip
以上包的加入方法，解压完，托入flan文件夹最后祝自己玩的开心！再见
